document_data.name: Orangutan
document_data.diet: Frugivore{{Cite dragon/95/The many shapes of apes|39}}
document_data.intelligence: Low{{Cite dragon/95/The many shapes of apes|38}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Orangutans'''<ref group="note">The real-world orangutan derives its name from the [[w:wikipedia:Malay language|Malay]] words ''orang'' "person" and ''hutan'' "forest". On Toril, the name likely derives from the equivalent language [[Lidahan]], which is known to share the [[Lidahan dictionary#O|the first]] of these two words. were arboreal solitary [[ape]]s.

Ecology.Habitats: Orangutans were found in the jungles of [[Kara-Tur]].
